--><OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:geo="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/geo/1.0/">
  <ShortName>Geoportal Search</ShortName>
  <Description>Geospatial metadata search.</Description>
  <Tags>geospatial metadata</Tags>
  <Contact/>
  <Url type="application/rss+xml" indexOffset="1" pageOffset="1" template="http://ngdc.noaa.gov/geoportal/rest/find/document?searchText={searchTerms}&start={startIndex?}&max={count?}&bbox={geo:box?}&f=georss"/>
  <Url type="text/html" indexOffset="1" pageOffset="1" template="http://ngdc.noaa.gov/geoportal/rest/find/document?searchText={searchTerms}&start={startIndex?}&max={count?}&bbox={geo:box?}&f=html"/>
    
  <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/png">http://ngdc.noaa.gov/geoportal/catalog/images/openSearch.png</Image>
  <Query role="example" searchTerms="land"/>
  <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>
  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>
  
  <!-- 
  <LongName>Example.com Web Search</LongName>
  <Image height="64" width="64" type="image/png">http://ngdc.noaa.gov/geoportal/catalog/images/websearch.png</Image>
  <Developer>Example.com Development Team</Developer>
  <Attribution>Search data Copyright 2005, Example.com, Inc., All Rights Reserved</Attribution>
  <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>
  <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>
  <Language>en-us</Language>
  -->
  
</OpenSearchDescription>
content: Geoportal Search Geospatial metadata search. geospatial metadata http://ngdc.noaa.gov/geoportal/catalog/images/openSearch.png UTF-8 UTF-8
